programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Hunt For The Bosses
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duisburg Mafia Murders in 2007. Late night, Antonio Russo leaves his restaurant with his nephew and employees. Suddenly two gunmen appear and open fire. Investigations lead to a village in Italy from which all victims originate.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Domingo (2018)
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: A Son

programme.title: On The Edge

programme.title: The Cuban

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Domingo (2018)
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Particles
programme.desc: As winter sets in and P.A. sees the world shifting around him, he starts to observe strange phenomena in the environment. The changes are imperceptible at first, but gradually his whole world seems to be on the brink.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: In post-COVID Tokyo, single mother Megumi is desperate to find her missing son Shinpei. After a shady young man claims to know her son’s whereabouts, he is invited into Megumi’s home where he soon uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Free Money
programme.desc: Based on true stories of the crypto and investment craze of the early 2020-ies. Crypto's allure, wealth's pursuit, and the lessons of a changing financial world collide in an intense journey of three interconnected lives - an unwitting Bitcoin holder, a crypto entrepreneur and a conservative banker.

programme.title: A Childhood
programme.desc: As summer drags by, 13-year-old Jimmy, forced by circumstance to become an adult too soon, runs up against the limits of his small hometown and his turbulent life, caught between a mother on the slide and a stepfather who keeps her down.

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: Murder in Biot
programme.desc: A wealthy heiress is poisoned during a dinner of the Biot Trade Association. All the guests are potential suspects. Two days later, one of the guests dies leaving a suicide note and confessing to the murder. But Deputy Prosecutor Richard is unconvinced.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.
